customer1-text: My panic attacks and fears really put a lot of strain on me, so I did the hypnosis session with Christin and got a personalized Transformational-Recording. This treatment has helped me to better understand where my fears come from and how I can help my body to live free and unburdened again. I would recommend it to anyone and am incredibly grateful for this experience!
customer2-text: I went to see Christin for confidence and success blocks and she did a great job.
